Projects

Ongoing Projects

  • BACKDRIVE - Huntington High School's VEX Robotics Competition team
  • Science Olympiad - Huntington High School's Division C Science Olympiad team
  • Hello World! - my friend Philip and I cataloguing our LEGO® Mindstorms-related projects
  • FaRCX - software for controlling LEGO® Mindstorms RCX robots over the internet which Philip and I wrote, and which we use to run FaRCX.ev3.pw.

LEGO® Educational Resources

  • LDD Sets - Educational LEGO® sets catalogued in LEGO® Digital Designer for your convenience.
